It’s been a funny old day. I was sent home from work for the first time due to having a sickness bug. 🤢 I had so much planned today but didn’t make it past midday. Ive been in bed since 1pm totally floored. Let’s hope it’s just a 24hr job as I want to see @JamTarts tomorrow❤️ https://t.co/ajOgZboQ6i

I've just been to our Disability Awareness Training at @JamTarts taken by our brilliant in-house Disability Officer Keith Ferguson. It's was really educational and lightly changes perception! Hearts' Disability Awareness Day is this Saturday vs @LiviFCOfficial with lots going on.
